text: Wishlist: Would love if when I had my cursor on an `endif` that it show me the corresponding `"if"` :crossed_fingers::skin-tone-3::clap::skin-tone-3: AND if when i "auto format" (ie: shift - tab) that it nested the if statements and foreach's
i agree, it is a useful feature with divs so this would help as well :slightly_smiling_face:

Hi Community,

I was looking on mobile from the preview in HubSpot and also from an Iphone. How can I centre the text where it says "get started" an make it look better that is on the page here? <https://www.incoognito.com/home>
